# primaryOverlay

**Type Property**

The primary view controller is layered on top of the secondary view controller, leaving the secondary view controller partially visible.

## Declaration

```swift
static var primaryOverlay: UISplitViewController.DisplayMode { get }
```

## Deprecated

- **primaryHidden**: The primary view controller is hidden.
- **allVisible**: The primary and secondary view controllers are displayed side-by-side onscreen.

items.description: The primary view controller is hidden.
items.name: primaryHidden

items.description: The primary and secondary view controllers are displayed side-by-side onscreen.
